title: Do Remains Found on Mt. Kilimanjaro Parallel a Biblical Story?
subtitle: The story of Joseph tells the tale of a brother spurned by his kin who then rises to a coveted appointment by the pharaoh of Egypt.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Remains discovered on Mount Kilimanjaro provide evidence to support the story of Joseph, a well-known Bible passage about a drought in what is now Egypt nearly 4,000 years ago.
